front.title: Usage of the Peer-to-Peer Streaming Protocol (PPSP)

abstract.t: This document focuses on several crucial operation issues of Peer-to- Peer Streaming Protocol (PPSP) usage, considering two basic modes: Leech mode and Seed mode. Related parameters setting for default PPSP scenario are also given from tracker protocol and peer protocol respectively. In addition, the limitations and gaps of current PPSP system are identified from the standpoint of satisfying PPSP requirements.
